ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD smashes Cars, tugs on Superman's cape and tortures FOX's 24 hero Jack Bauer! MAD also spoofs The Daily Show, amusement parks, parents, cell phones, Congress, the World Cup and much more. Plus, Spy vs. Spy!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:08:41. [Issue ID 129301]
